verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Do you wanna know?
Where I'm going?
Where I'm going, soon.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If anybody asks you,
Where I'm going,
Where I'm going, soon.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
CHORUS
I'm goin' up yonder
I'm goin' up yonder
I'm goin' up yonder
To be with my Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I can take the pain,
The heartaches they bring,
The comfort in knowing,
I'll soon be gone.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
As God gives me grace,
I'll run this race,
Until I see my Savior,
face to face.
